description:
testing: add test for issue 5599

Update issue 5599

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

seems not worth the trouble to split the actual fix and the test into two
CLs, esp. since the fix only requires insertion of one equal sign.

Opps, I forgot the copyright notices. Adding them now.


On Fri, May 31, 2013 at 10:34 PM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> seems not worth the trouble to split the actual fix and the test into two
> CLs, esp. since the fix only requires insertion of one equal sign.

Hi Minux,

I think the fix might be a little harder than expected, try it with
this CL. Anyway, I don't want to steal all of Keith's thunder.

On Fri, May 31, 2013 at 10:37 PM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:
> Opps, I forgot the copyright notices. Adding them now.
>
>
> On Fri, May 31, 2013 at 10:34 PM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
>> seems not worth the trouble to split the actual fix and the test into two
>> CLs, esp. since the fix only requires insertion of one equal sign.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org, minux.ma@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=fd791d51e476 ***
